page.title: 04Warton Parish Council
page.content: There are 6 Councillors for Warton and 2 for Millhead. Traffic and parking in narrow Main Street is of perennial concern. Provision in a nearby quarry is largely ignored. A public enquiry in 1982 into holiday chalets proposed at Leighton Park, gained Ministerial approval, despite vigorous opposition, but subject to a traffic solution which is still the subject of lively local debate. Minor vandalism to signs and seats is a regular issue. Other items include planning, rural footpaths, transport services and minor complaints. The Council donates sums annually to local organistions. Chairman is Mrs.E.Rudkin who has had many years of public service. She serves on many local committees and is a School Governor.
